name: Wanderu Inc.
description: Developer of a travel metasearch engine designed to book inter-city buses and trains. The company's engine helps to book buses, trains, and flight tickets online, view past reservations and save frequently searched trips, enabling travelers to find and compare tickets for convenient and cost-effective itineraries.
